TopicTitle: The damned tower on the launchpad

Articles.Content:
I know the tower on the launchpad is to make it realistic, but all it does is it gets in the way. I can't tell you how many rockets I've had to adjust because of that freaking tower.

As for the launch pad, it would be nice to make it a bit larger for some of the wider rockets.

Tell me what you think.
I agree, the tower should be removed ot made optional, the launch clamps are more that enough, soyuz style.
Just put those things that hold rockets up on and lift your rocket high up in the VAB building. I manage to lift my rockets over the tower itself using this method

Copy your craft file from the vab folder to the sph folder

Load onto runway
